bugs.cf_release_notes:
Cause: 
the way of generate change log has some problem

Consequence: 
For each status transition, the second (new) status is shown as a number, e.g. the transition from PROPOSED to CONFIRMED status is shown as "Field case_status changed from PROPOSED to 4."
Fix: 
fix the view

Result: 
The transition from PROPOSED to CONFIRMED status is shown as "Field case_status changed from PROPOSED to CONFIRMED."
